title: Translate Something
prompt: I would like some text translated.

title: Draft an Email
prompt: Can you draft an email on a specific subject for me?

title: Brainstorm Ideas
prompt: I need assistance brain storming about a specific idea.

title: Explain a Culture or Region
prompt: I need to know about a specific culture or region.

title: Summarize Text
prompt: I need a large set of text summarized.

title: Automate Something
prompt: I need to automate something for work. Can you suggest some ways I might do that based on the task?

title: Suggest Some Options for Help
prompt: I'm not sure where to start with how I might need assistance. Can you suggest some ways in which you can help?
